But as usual, the overreaction betrays the power we hold. They are terrified, absolutely terrified to see young people full of joy, or anger, young people full of power, fed up with the status quo. Defenders of the status quo see the writing on the wall, too. Hot summer.

Tearing down George Floyd Square in MN and raiding Washington Square Park in NY are undeniably connected, if not coordinated- the police and politicians know the power of our public spaces, and they fear us finding and listening to each other again.

Tuned my snare and practiced for a while. Wrists and pointer fingers are sore. Good.
The best part about playing live music, even if you are messing up a song completely, it's only for about 5 minutes. Which is nice.
MySpace is such an enormous piece of shit.
Arley's a big YouTube dork.
I love my doggy. Maybe it's stockholm syndrome.
Thinking about building a composing outhouse in my backyard. That'd be cool.
I find the most joy in looking  through different lenses. Looking at the future through the lens of the past. And vice versa. Everything.
Aw. I dropped my lighter and my dog picked it up and brought it over to me. She's a good dog.
Diane Rehm: woman tremolo.
Effing ticks on Eevee. BE GONE YOU BLOODSUCKERS.
Desktop clean. Room ever so slightly cleaner. Put doggy's toys in her crate to clean up and she immediately brought them back to the couch.
I need a mug to hold writing utensils and, well, I need it to be AWESOME.
Today is a day that requires room cleaning.
Aw... new ep of Weeds just makes me want more...
"Police say Montgomery man, 19, with knife fled into woods" - Local paper. I honestly don't think someone who is nineTEEN counts as a man...
Playing pinball.
